titleStmt.title: That's How Love Starts, Ya Know!

sp.speaker: Bully A
sp.p: I said, if you ain't lendin' me money, then no date today. Oh, but I'd be okay if you finally put out instead. You'll pay for the love hotel, though.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You need to be punched!

sp.speaker: Bully A
sp.p: Why you little… You're full of it! I've had enough of you! Yer broke and ya ain't puttin' out! Get lost!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Gimme a break, moron! Octopus! Squid! Tuna!

sp.speaker: Muko
sp.p: Totes funny! Seafood names aren't insults.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Come on, comfort me! He was my first boyfriend.

sp.speaker: Muko
sp.p: That's why I told you to not go for him. What was so good about him, anyway?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: He looked like Ken Takakura.

sp.speaker: Muko
sp.p: Oh, there you go. You're so annoying.

sp.speaker: Miko
sp.p: Oh, there you go. You're so annoying.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Nothing wrong with that! I like masculine guys like Ken Takakura!

sp.speaker: Muko
sp.p: "I am an awkward fellow, after all." Dudes like that are extinct.

sp.speaker: Miko
sp.p: Dudes like that are extinct.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: What the hell. Will I not be able to meet another Mr. Ken in my lifetime? Come on, someone comfort me! Such a cruel world.

sp.speaker: Extra
sp.p: -Damn it! -You missed?

sp.speaker: Extra
sp.p: -I did miss. -Don't look over here. Gross.

sp.speaker: Extra
sp.p: -We have this, too. -Nice.

sp.speaker: Extra
sp.p: Put a magnet inside.

sp.speaker: Extra
sp.p: This'll hurt, won't it?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: What are you reading there?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Oh? Uh, um…

stage.caption: BIRTH OF THE AEROSPACE SELF-DEFENSE FORCE GUARDING OUTER SPACE!!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: How lame. Do only scum live in this world? Man, I've had enough. Where can I relieve all this stress?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Miss Momo Ayase! -I know you're in love!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: -Huh?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I know you're in love!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: How many times you gonna say that?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Someone like Miss Ayase talking to me? That's gotta be the only reason!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Maybe you got the wrong idea? It's not like I wanna get chummy with you or anything. Forget all that earlier.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: This is what I'm talking about!

stage.caption: The President has already gone to Mars! What is the entirety of Project Pegasus?!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Huh? What?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: You're a fan of the occult!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Oh, I don't believe in UFOs or aliens or stuff like that.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'm not talking about a UFO, but a UAP! Unidentified Aerial Phenomena!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Hey, you're being a pest.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: The U.S. military has officially acknowledged the existence of UAPs and reformed the Space Force! Japan has also newly created an Aerospace Self-Defense Force! Any way you look at it, they're getting ready for Space Wars!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Can I go now?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: What? No, wait! This has the newest image of Nessie, too. Here! It also talks about Lieutenant Colonel Jim Channon and Skinwalker Ranch!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Shut up! I just got dumped so I don't want any of this. How you push stuff at me is so typical of otaku and really annoying! That's why you have no friends! Don't talk to me like you know me. Sorry, that was a bit much.

stage.caption: YOUR TRUE POWERS AND POTENTIAL HAVE YET TO AWAKEN…

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Here. I don't believe in aliens. But I do believe in ghosts.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Oh no, there's no such thing as ghosts.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I matched the conversation topic to yours, but you outright deny that?! Don't you mock the occult! Just so you know, my grandma is a spirit medium.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: What?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Have you ever seen an exorcism? It's really wicked! The possessed person goes into convulsions! You can go into convulsions from illness, too.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: It's not proof that ghosts are out there.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Then have you ever had an alien let you ride a UFO?!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Your logic is jumping too far! Are you an idiot?!

sp.speaker: Muko
sp.p: Huh? She gave up on Ken Takakura and went after an otaku?

sp.speaker: Miko
sp.p: Look. It's like she doesn't care what other people would think.

sp.speaker: Muko
sp.p: Can't say I hate it.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Then let's have a contest, dammit! If there really are ghosts, you'll be serving me as a gofer!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'll show you UFOs, I mean, UAPs! If you're able to see one, M-Miss Ayase, you'll be my gofer instead!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: What is this place? It's way too scary! What part of this is a UFO hotspot?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: They call that Nagi Hospital a sanctuary for UFOs! If you call for a UFO on the roof, you will experience an Abduction!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: What's an Abduction?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: That's when an alien kidnaps you and experiments with your body.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Wait, hold on! Have you been experimented on before?!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: There is a chance that I have!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Huh?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Many people who experience an Abduction have their memories erased.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Hey, you. You've never seen a UFO before, have you?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Do you know about regressive hypnosis?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Don't change the subject on me.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: It's not an issue of whether or not you've seen one! The point is whether or not there's proper proof that they exist!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Shut up! Anyway, how are things on your end?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I have arrived. At the spiritual hotspot. Now, I'll go and prove it right now… that there are no such things as ghosts!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Hey, you aren't freaking out, are you? By the way, that spot is famous on the 'net for something definitely being there.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Too shy, shy boy, in this moment!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: They say speaking loudly is the most dangerous thing to do.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Too shy, shy boy…

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: On the 'net.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: You've been mentioning the 'net a lot. So have you seen a ghost, Miss Ayase?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Nope.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: What? How dare you talk so authoritatively earlier!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: My bad!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Take back that attitude you've been giving me! It's absurd that you've never seen a ghost but believe in them!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: It's not absurd. I told you my grandma's a spirit medium. I love my grandma a lot since I don't have parents.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Oh, I see.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Why are you getting all meek and stuff? Get a load of this. My family is seriously weird.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I always had to perform a good luck ritual before stepping outside. I was always forced to do it the entire way to school. And of course, I was the laughingstock of all the boys. If I don't do it, Grandma got pissed. It was the pits. But the toughest part of it all… was when the boy I liked made fun of me. I really hated my grandma. "Because of that weird ritual, the boy I like hates me." I think I said something horrible like that to Grandma.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Since then, I didn't talk to Grandma until recently, and I stopped doing the ritual. But you know, I get pissed when someone else makes fun of my family. That's when I realized…

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I didn't hate the fact that the boy I liked didn't like me. I hated the fact that the boy I liked made fun of my grandma. In reality, I loved both Grandma and her job as a spirit medium, because it felt special. How she decided to take me in, and lovingly raised me all by herself… I have faith in my grandma.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: That's why I believe in ghosts. So anyway, why do you believe in aliens?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: That really doesn't matter, right?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: What's with that? You don't have any reasons? Do you need a reason to like something? Well, you have a point. More like, Occult-kun, you sure talk bluntly over the phone.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I-Is that so? Miss Ayase, you're pretty easy to talk to.

sp.speaker: Turbo Granny
sp.p: I'll let you suckle my teats, so… lemme gobble that weenie.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Ghost!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Hold on! You shouldn't run there! Hey, Occult-kun!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: No way! Impossible! -That was just an ordinary granny!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: -Oc… kun… -Stop right now!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: -That's it. -Just an ordinary granny!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: -They say on the 'net she's bad news!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'm pretty sure I misunderstood something. I simply bumped into a lewd granny!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: They say you can't let her outrun you at any cost! If you lose a race against Turbo Granny, you'll be cursed! Hey, Occult-kun! Are you listening? Hello? Answer me! You're kidding me, right?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I'll head over there right now! Just hang on! What are those things? Seriously, cut it out.

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: Hello, woman person. We are Serpoians. We are called that because we come from the planet Serpo.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Aliens?

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: Don't be afraid. We are a friendly people.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Friendly guys don't strip girls naked, you know! Where are my clothes?

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: We have taken proper care of your belongings.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: They're all tattered! Pay for damages! And I wanna go home, so can you take this off?

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: Our kind only has males. Thus, we reproduce through clone technology.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Are you even listening?

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: However, identical units do not instigate biological evolution. Conflict, as well as basic emotions, were annihilated. Therefore, for us to regain reproductive function similar to humans, we want your "bananas." We will now have sex. After having sex with you, we will extract your uterus and your banana for research.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Gimme a break! I did date a douchebag, but I didn't let him take my virginity! My chastity has been saved for a Ken Takakura I have yet to meet! No way some creepy alien is gonna take it from me!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: In order to arouse your desire, we will use psychokinesis to control your brain waves. How is it? Isn't the temperature of your body getting warmer? What's this? She is resisting the psychokinesis. What incredible spiritual power. However… Let us begin.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: No… Stop!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: A phone call? Someone sure has a really bad sense of timing.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Miss Ayase! I'm sorry! There was a ghost! Turbo Granny has cursed me!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Occult-kun! I'm glad! Can you help me?

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: Who are you? Infiltrating using a smartphone. Not even we have technology like that.

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: Please help! I can't control myself!

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: Lemme gobble that weenie!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Come on, get a grip!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: Man person over there. We did not authorize your intrusion. Leave immediately, or else… Please give us your banana.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Gross!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: Six Sense Organs! So fast! I cannot set my psychokinesis. Our cherished bananas! You banana thief! Serpoian Form Serpo-Grammetry!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Occult-kun!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: We have never encountered someone so aggressive. We have an amiable relationship with humans. So give us your bananas.

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: I'll give it to you! Anything if it's mine! I've been wanting to see aliens for the longest time! Because I didn't have any friends, I thought at least aliens would be my friends. I've been calling to the skies for a UFO since grade school! But you never came! No matter how much I called for you, you never showed up! Other humans bullied me to pass their time. Aliens didn't give me the time of day. Nobody ever acknowledged my existence. But Miss Ayase…. She actually stood up for me, despite that! So don't you lay a finger on her! I won't allow anyone to hurt her! If it's for her sake, I'll even become a monster!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Keep at it, Occult-kun! Show 'em what a man you are!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: Fie!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Miss Ayase… It looks impossible after all.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You gave up really fast there!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: We cannot become friends with a violent person like you. Besides, we like woman persons more than man persons. Now, once again, I shall arouse your desire.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Take your chi out.

sp.speaker: Kid Momo
sp.p: I don't wanna. My friends make fun of me every single day because of that.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: What are you talking about? If you have your chi out, you won't get hurt or sick. Bad things can't get near you. First, firm up your lower abs. Imagine having your chi shoot up from the top of your head.

sp.speaker: Extra
sp.p: She's doing it again!

sp.speaker: Extra
sp.p: Is she communicating with aliens or something?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I hate it! I'm never doing it again!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Momo! Hold on!

sp.speaker: Kid Momo
sp.p: I hate you, Grandma! You fake spirit medium!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Why am I remembering the past right now? I'm sorry, Grandma. I just felt embarrassed back then.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Firm up your lower abs. Chi shoot up from the top of your head.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: No way! What?

sp.speaker: Cursed Ken
sp.p: Miss Ayase, you can use psychic powers?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Well, I'm surprised by that myself!

sp.speaker: Rokuro
sp.p: Unbelievable! My psychokinesis is being pushed back! Why? Did I stimulate her brain waves too much and cause the woman person's chakra to open up?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: She was for real. Grandma was a real spirit medium! Thank you, Grandma! With this, I can take those scumbags… and send them flying! What is this? That was a UFO? Occult-kun, are you okay? Let's get outta here! Ow! What are you doing, idiot! Regain your sanity already! Damn you! Turbo Granny?

sp.speaker: Turbo Granny
sp.p: Who the hell are you?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: His curse hasn't lifted! Granny is out of his body, though!

sp.speaker: Turbo Granny
sp.p: I have possession of that kid's weenie. As long as I have his weenie, that kid's curse won't be lifted. If you want it back, come to the tunnel. This place is too far for me. I'll take you on as much as you want if it's in the tunnel, gaudy hag.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Who you calling a gaudy hag, you old bag of crap! Give him back his thingy! Crap! If we don't escape, we're gonna die! Get a grip, you idiot! We're gonna escape!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: This is the worst. I'll believe in aliens. Like, I was kidnapped and all.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'll believe in ghosts, too. I got cursed after all.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: So, what should we do from here?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: What should we do?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You lose control of yourself if I don't hold the curse back with psychic powers.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'm sorry.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I lost my uniform, my wallet, my smartphone. Everything.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: How can I lift this curse?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You have to beat the crap out of Turbo Granny. She's the cause of the curse.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I see. Then I'll head on over there.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Huh? Right now?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Miss Ayase, please wear my clothes back home.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Hold on! You'll lose control without me!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: All of this happened because of what I did. I can't get you involved in it anymore, Miss Ayase. I'll use willpower to make it to the tunnel, and then make it work somehow.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Why can't you ask me to come with you? After that experience earlier, I can't leave you alone! You would've died earlier if I wasn't around!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Is it okay for you to help someone like me?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Stuff like that is such a hassle. Come on, put some clothes on. Let's go!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'm sorry. I am an awkward fellow, after all. Miss Ayase, please put some clothes on. If you don't, I can't bring myself to speak properly.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: No way. Why is my heart racing? This can't be. I was just surprised because he happened to recite one of Ken Takakura's lines. I need to calm down for now. By the way, what's your name? I'm terrible at remembering names. Oh? Um…

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'm Ken Takakura.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Aliens really did exist!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Ghosts exist, too! The existence of aliens and ghosts being proven means that there's a possibility of supernatural phenomena, UMA, and all other things that were said to be absurd can be proven as well.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Oh, fine, I get it! Ready.
